name: Microsoft Binary Suspicious Communication Endpoint
description: Detects an executable in the Windows folder accessing suspicious domains
query: (network.direction:/[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]/ AND destination.domain:(/.*[Dd][Ll]\.[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Bb][Oo][Xx][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\// OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz]/ OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee]/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Rr][Aa][Ww]\// OR /.*\.[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo]\// OR /.*[Uu][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo]/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn]/ OR /.*[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\.[Ss][Hh]/) AND process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\[Pp][Uu][Bb][Ll][Ii][Cc]\\.*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(network.direction:true AND destination.domain:(*dl.dropboxusercontent.com OR *.pastebin.com OR *.githubusercontent.com OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/ OR *mediafire.com OR *mega.nz OR *ddns.net OR *.paste.ee OR *.hastebin.com\/raw\/ OR *.ghostbin.co\/ OR *ufile.io OR *anonfiles.com OR *send.exploit.in OR *transfer.sh) AND process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\* OR C\:\\Users\\Public\\*))`
